snippet: At the UBS media and communications conference, Jean-Michel Etienne, chief financial officer of the Publicis Groupe, spoke of his company's many acquisitions. Hours later, reporters learned of another one - the purchase of AR New York.
abstract: At the UBS media and communications conference, Jean-Michel Etienne, chief financial officer of the Publicis Groupe, spoke of his company's many acquisitions. Hours later, reporters learned of another one - the purchase of AR New York.

headline.main: Publicis Groupe Makes an Acquisition, After Explaining the Joy of Acquisitions
